A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It'll take me a few more watches to really appreciate it fully but this by far exceeded my expectations. It was an emotional roller coaster balancing the humourous jabs and roiling turmoil that befell our favorite characters. This film really competes with Empire\, I thought I'd never get to say that. As a side note\, it really hit me hard seeing our princess again with her powerful and commanding presence on the bridge of her cruiser.
